item.description:
Good Hands

Everyone knows how to heal with their hands.
Massage therapists, energy workers, somatic practitioners and healers practice the laying on of hands every day.
How do we make the internal connection between our educated hearts and our informed hands?
This workshop looks at the outer science and inner science helping us understand how the heart-hand connection heals.
Open to all.  No prior experience necessary.


Dawn Jordan is a massage therapist and writer, creator of BODYWISDOM, a form of somatic education that aligns thinking, feeling and action. www.Bodywisdom.pro

 

Potluck lunch from 11:30 - 12:15 pm.  Presentation from 12:15 - 1:15 pm.

Let us know what you'll bring to the potluck when you RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: I will welcome you at the door
item.name: March Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
